title: Apple TV+ films get six award nominations at Oscars 2022, including Best Picture recognition for ‘CODA’
content:
Apple TV+ and Apple Original Films had its best outing at the Oscars so far, with six total nominations for the company.

Most notably, CODA nabbed the most prestigious Best Picture Oscar nomination. Incidentally, CODA is also the first movie with a predominantly deaf cast to land a Best Picture nomination.
